title: uruga vENum murugA
sahitya:
uruga vENum murugA unnuLLam enpAl uruga vENum murugA


anupallavi

  oru kaDugaLavEnum karuNaiyuDanE nI siriyEn paDum iDar shIghiram pOkkiDa


caraNam    aDuttaDuttE varum aLavilAp-perum allal ellAm ini illAmal maraiyavE
toDuttiDumOr paNi toDarndiDavE aruLaik-koDuttu en tuyarai tuDaittu viDavE
